His mother remembers him watching the news and saying This is Tony Smith with the 6 o'clock news. Tony Smith was born in Chicago and is a graduate of Barry University in Miami. Tony Smith spends his free time watching movies, enjoying the great outdoors and swimming. He lives in the Aksarben Village area.

Bloomberg Businessweek has an interesting report citing those infamous`` people in the know,'' claiming that Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer is readying href="http://www.businessweek.com/news/2011-02-07/microsoft-s-ceo-is-said-to-extend-management-shake-up.html"> a management shakeup which will place more senior product executives who have a strong engineering background. The thinking: Microsoft needs more technology-minded top dogs to help the company compete( or at least to provide the outward impression that engineering prowess still matters in Redmond).
